name: Manna for our Malices
description: Akagi Ai is unexpectedly stabbed on her way home from school. She finds her spirit possessing her body from earlier that day, and must collaborate with the past self that inhabits her body to discover why she keeps dying -- and why she keeps coming back.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 16 colors Storage: 300 MB available space
